lead_paragraph: Our city was the scene of unusual excitemont last evening, on account of a painful rumor that the steamer Brilliant, hence for Bayou Sara, with a large number of passengers, had exploded at some point near Bayou Goula, on her upward trip. What little particulars we could learn of this steamboat disaster are obtained from the officers of the steamboat Montgomery, which will be found below.

headline.main: Steamboat Explosion--Destruction of the Brilliant--Great Loss of Life.
